item.title: Black Ops 7 Zombies Gets New Maps, Enemies & More in Season 1
item.content:encoded:
Season 1 is on the horizon in Black Ops 7, and the first season in the latest Call of Duty title is bringing a host of new content across all game modes, including Zombies.

Zombies in Black Ops 7 launched with two maps, the larger, story-based Ashes of the Damned map, with a smaller segment of the map, Vandorn Farm, used for the Survival mode, and the tally of maps is set to more than double in Season 1‚Äîalong with the addition of new enemies and the return of content from other Black Ops titles.

Zombies Receives New Map & Two Survival Maps in Black Ops 7 Season 1

As revealed in the latest blog post ahead of Season 1, which kicks off on December 4, Astra Malorum is the next story map in Zombies where players explore ‚Äúan evil presence festering in the Dark Aether.‚Äù

The map features a new enemy, the O.S.C.A.R Elite Robot, a new Wonder Weapon, the LGM-1, and new traps, alongside the story quest and easter eggs to uncover.

For players grinding through Camo challenges and wanting a change of scenery from Vandorm Farm, Season 1 provides exactly that with Exit 115, another location from the larger Ashes of the Damned map, available in Survival from launch, with the Zorya Observatory following in mid-season.

Alongside the new maps, a slew of new and returning Ammo Mods will become available, including Light Mind and Shatter Blast, Field Upgrades, including Tesla Storm and Frost Blast, and the return of the fan-favorite Perk Mule Kick‚Äîall of which have their own Research to complete.

Zombies will also support the addition of seven new weapons, with some available at the start and others arriving mid-season, 11 new Weapon Attachments, while Directed Mode for the Ashes of the Damned story quest will also be available, guiding players through the necessary steps for completion.

What do you think about the Season 1 additions coming to Black Ops 7 Zombies? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Black Ops 7, read about the game‚Äôs player count compared to Battlefield 6, and check out details of a huge drop in sales for the franchise in Europe.

item.title: Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows x Attack on Titan Crossover Announced
item.content:encoded:
Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows‚Äô Attack on Titan crossover is live with title update 1.1.6; however, the quest is only available for a limited time, until December 22, 2025.

The details about Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows have been less lately, with AC Mirage taking up the news in recent days. We recently learned the title crossed 10 million players thanks to the arrival of its Valley of Memory DLC. Now, we are receiving new content for AC Shadows as well, with popular manga and anime series Attack on Titan making its way into the game.

Assassin‚Äôs Creed: Shadows‚Äô Attack on Titan Crossover Will Add New Skins for Yasuke and Naoe

The Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows Attack on Titan crossover goes live on November 25 and will run until December 22. During this time, players can take part in a limited-time quest where they face a mysterious, power-hungry faction that has infiltrated feudal Japan and kidnapped a Titan Shifter. There‚Äôs a lone survivor with a dark secret who fails to rescue the Shifter and then recruits Naoe and Yasuke to help them out.

To unlock the AOT quest in AC Shadows, players will have to first unlock Yasuke as a playable character and then head to the Yamashiro region, North of Hanazo Tower. While playing the quest, players will unlock new banners and a statue for their hideout and will acquire a crystal katana for Naoe once completed.

Along with the quest, AC Shadows will also receive the Attack on Titan Dual Pack, which is inspired by the series‚Äô universe. This pack includes new outfits, weapons, trinkets, and a new mount. Some of what we saw in the trailer showed Naoe wearing Mikasa Ackerman‚Äôs iconic costume, and Yasuke wearing a titan-themed armour.

Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows Third Story Drop: A Puzzlement

Assassin‚Äôs Creed: Shadows title update 1.1.6 introduces the game‚Äôs third story drop, along with the Attack on Titan crossover. The new quest is called ‚ÄúA Puzzlement‚Äù, and it has been described as fun and humorous. It will feature Yasuke and Naoe engaging with two old acquaintances who are having a loud argument about a mysterious door in South Wakasa, and they have tasked the duo with figuring out how to open it.

The quest will have Yasuke and Naoe learning each other‚Äôs skills as well. Naoe will learn to perform her own spectacular version of Yasuke‚Äôs war-kick ability. Yasuke will learn to stealthily dispatch enemies non-lethally. Players will also finally be able to settle the debate as to who would win in a straight-up duel between our two protagonists.

Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows Title Update 1.1.6 Patch Notes

The new update also features improvements towards Corrupted Castles and a host of bug fixes that you can check out in the patch notes below:

Corrupted Castles

Improvements have also been made to Corrupted Castles. The chances of encountering the same castles from the previous season have been reduced, and the available castles each season will now provide a better distribution of Daisho per castles.

List of Bug Fixes

SPOILER WARNING

Stability

  • Fixed an issue where the game crashed when switching to the ‚ÄòSell Items‚Äô tab in some menus.

Gameplay

  • Corrected the two Tanuki Sumi-e rewards so they are no longer swapped.
  • Sword Hunter‚Äôs Prized Odachi Blade can now be obtained from the Sword Hunter.
  • Loadout slots will no longer reset automatically after completing quests.
  • Sliding doors will no longer prevent players from summoning allies. You shall now pass!
  • Resolved an issue where the gear vendor in Mibuno Vale kept some engravings for himself.
  • Addressed a naming issue between the Green Pheasant and the Copper Pheasant, where they sometimes switched personalities. Freaky‚Ä¶
  • Ezio gear engravings now correctly unlock between multiple saves.
  • Fixed an issue where the player could purchase the same swords Karuta cards multiple times.
  • Fixed an issue where the Sword of Fathoms Katana allowed a double transmog exploit, enabling a stack of four engravings.
  • Fixed an issue where certain Bunny, Deer and Doe, Green Pheasant and Flying Squirrel pets were unobtainable.
  • Players will no longer get stuck when trying to exit Miyataki Warehouse. Get outside and touch some grass!

Combat

  • Yasuke can now correctly perform finishers with non-postured attacks.
  • Addressed an issue where the Bo Staff did not trigger Counterstrike as intended.
  • Summoned allies will no longer flee combat after only taking only a few hits.

UI

  • Addressed an issue where the UI indicator for pricing displayed reversed values.

Visuals & Graphics

  • Addressed an issue where the Dragon Hideout building skin was missing the floor.
  • The Robe of Ezio outfit no longer glitches while climbing.
  • Fixed an issue where Widower‚Äôs Solace Saya Katana was a duplicate of Iga‚Äôs Flame Saya Katana.
  • Corrected the knowledge description formatting for Naoe‚Äôs ‚ÄúDamage With Ability‚Äù.
  • Fixed an issue where Kimura Kei had texture clipping through his legs during the fight in the quest ‚ÄúFighting For The Cause‚Äù.

Localization

  • Corrected some NPC dialogue in Italian that addressed Naoe despite playing as Yasuke.
  • Corrected the Momochi Sandayu German voice lines during the ‚ÄúTraditions‚Äù quest.
  • Addressed an issue where Korean characters (Î¥á Ïúô Ïäê ÎÇç) displayed as corrupted square boxes (‚ñ°).

Quests

MAJOR SPOILERS AHEAD!

  • ‚ÄúFighting For The Cause‚Äù: Fixed an issue where Kimura Kei could get stuck on a balcony and become invulnerable during the quest.
  • ‚ÄúGo With The Bo‚Äù: Fixed an issue where items such as the Long Stick Disciple costume and headband obtained from the quest were missing.
  • ‚ÄúRide Into Town‚Äù: Addressed an issue where players were unable to proceed in the quest because Rin wouldn‚Äôt move.
  • ‚ÄúSuika No Bakemono‚Äù: Corrected the quest reward.
  • ‚ÄúThe Pirate Alliance‚Äù: Fixed an issue where the quest could not be completed because Oni-Yuri glitched when killed.
  • Players will now correctly receive the Classic Tea Bowl collection after defeating ‚ÄúThe Wise‚Äù.

Claws of Awaji

  • Addressed an issue where Yasuhira‚Äôs Secret could not be collected after completing the DLC.
  • Corrected the description for Yasuhira‚Äôs Secret (Spymaster EPZ Fallback Letter).
  • Fixed an issue where moving a plank at Myoshoji Temple with Yasuke, caused it to no longer be moved by Naoe.
  • Naoe will no longer get stuck on the big tree in Izanagi Shrine during the quest ‚ÄúA Snake In The Shrine‚Äù.
  • Keys collectibles are now correctly present, with a total of 15 collectibles scattered across Awaji island.

PLATFORM SPECIFIC

XBOX

  • Fixed an issue where the audio cuts out, and the game crashes on Xbox after Title Update 1.1.1.

The new update details were found on Ubisoft‚Äôs website.

In other news, check out Insider Gaming‚Äôs exclusive report which states Assassin‚Äôs Creed Black Flag Remake will release before March 31. What are your thoughts on Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows x Attack on Titan? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Skate Story becoming a Day One launch on PlayStation Plus. Don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Leaked Discord Messages Reveal Why Rockstar Fired 34 Employees
item.content:encoded:
The Rockstar Games employee dismissals have dominated gaming headlines for several weeks. Now, a new report has revealed the Discord messages that are believed to have led to the termination of 34 Rockstar Games workers.

Insider Gaming reported back in October about GTA 6 Workers allegedly being fired to prevent union forming. Since then, Rockstar Games has claimed that the fired employees were leaking information. There have been protests since, and the company has since been hit with legal action over the firings.

But now, a new development has seemingly uncovered the actual Discord messages at the root of everything.

Rockstar Games Allegedly Accessed Union Discord Server

People Make Games released an eye-opening video on November 24 titled: ‚ÄúThe Messages Rockstar Saw Before Firing 34 Union Members.‚Äù

The reporter claims that they have ‚Äúsince spoken to a Rockstar insider, who has shared screenshots with People Make Games of what they believe to be the messages sent just a few weeks ago on that Discord server, which directly contributed to the firings of these 34 former employees. We also know how Rockstar got hold of these messages as well.‚Äù

According to People Make Games, the source is ‚Äúnot one of the fired workers‚Äù and isn‚Äôt even part of the union. The Discord server has apparently been around since 2022 and consisted of various Rockstar employees.

The reporter‚Äôs source claims that ‚ÄúThey couldn‚Äôt recall a single example of any confidential game details being shared.‚Äù It‚Äôs said that the beginning of October 2025 saw Rockstar Games revise its policies pertaining to the company Slack‚Äîa messaging platform usually used by workplaces.

Various non-essential chats were removed, with the company claiming them to be a ‚Äúdistraction‚Äù and a source of ‚Äúpoor conduct‚Äù.

This ‚ÄúSlack purge‚Äù did not go down well. The union Discord server discussed these changes, with one individual saying: ‚ÄúI would really like to see the evidence for them being too much of a productivity hit. I can‚Äôt imagine it being worth the absolute dumpsterfire this will be for morale.‚Äù

It‚Äôs alleged that Rockstar‚Äôs Slack revision email was sent out after 5 PM‚Äîand employees can‚Äôt check their emails outside of work‚Äîand a second email about guidelines and conduct was also pushed. The emails were shared by people still in the office on Discord to inform other colleagues who hadn‚Äôt seen them yet.

‚ÄúThis led to one member of the Discord approaching studio management to express concerns about the discussions taking place,‚Äù the report adds. Additionally, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm told this either contributed to or kicked off an investigation into the Discord by the company, which does line up with the timings we now understand.‚Äù

The report claims it‚Äôs likely Rockstar did manage to access the union Discord server. Soon after, the whole world learned of the firings, with Rockstar presumably identifying individuals in the union chat who had broken guidelines, weren‚Äôt adhering to policy, and potentially attributed this to leaks.

You can see recreations of the Discord messages in the full video below.

What do you make of these new findings? Who‚Äôs in the wrong here? Share your opinion on the whole situation down below or in the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Insider Gaming has even more news stories to check out, including a New Marathon Community Playtest Being Announced, Black Ops 7 Suffering The Worst Japan Launch In Its 20-Year Franchise History, and Stellar Blade Being ‚ÄòThe Best-Selling PlayStation-Exclusive Launch IP In History‚Äô For PC.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 Includes More Maps, Weapons, and More
item.content:encoded:
Activision has announced what‚Äôs it‚Äôs calling ‚Äúthe biggest Black Ops season one ever‚Äù. In a post on social media, it was revealed that Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 will kick off on December 4, and it‚Äôll include a number of updates and additions for players.

Season 1 of the annual shooter will feature six additional multiplayer maps. It‚Äôll also include what‚Äôs being described as ‚Äúan out-of-this-world Round-Based Zombies map‚Äù and two new Survival experiences.

On the weapons front, there will be seven new additions for players. What type of weapons and how to unlock them haven‚Äôt been announced just yet. Lastly, there will be new Endgame World Events, Weekly Challenges, and ‚Äúmore‚Äù in the season.

It‚Äôs worth noting that there was no clarification regarding what will be available at Season 1‚Äôs launch versus what will come midway through. Full details on the new maps, weapons, and everything in between will be shared shortly.

What do you think about what Activision has planned for Black Ops 7 Season 1? Leave your thoughts down below and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the exclusive update on the Prince of Persia: Sands of Time Remake. And don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

New Marathon Community Playtest Announced, Still No Release Date

Marathon is already lining up another playtest in its sights, but there‚Äôs still no inkling of a potential release date for the game.

Helldivers 2 Devs Talk About Next Game

Arrowhead Game Studios has revealed that their next game will follow the legacy of Helldivers. Here are more details.

GTA Online FiveM Mods Can Now Be Converted for Enhanced Edition

FiveM has released a new tool called Alchemist, which lets users convert GTA 5 Legacy mods for the Enhanced Edition.

AMD Reportedly Raising Graphics Card Prices Due To Memory Costs

According to a new report, AMD is set to raise the price of its graphics cards to combat the rising costs of memory.
